name: Oven Trouble!
description:
*WARNING - This game is still very early, so I apologise if you gain any anger towards me as a creator due to the current state of the game.

This game was my attempt at doing everything myself (that excludes sound for the moment) and I think it came out fine. I plan on making the game more advance with a few tweaks but that might be very down the line as I need to put my full mind into this to do anything. But I at least hope you like what I have given out so far.

This game's controls are:

 -Keyboard
==========

Z = To breath on the ovens.

(*) S = Turns sound on.

Arrow keys = Controls me.

Backspace = Selects gamemode, pauses the game while in game.

Enter = Before the game has started, you can set the alarm.
press enter again to turn your alarm off.

R = Restarts the game.

Escape = Closes the game.

1 - 4 = Changes the size of the screen.

5 = Puts the game in fullscreen.

-Controller
==========

B button (Xbox pad)/Circle button (PS pad) = To breath on the ovens.

D-pad/Analog stick = Controls me.

Select button = Selects gamemode, pauses the game while in game.

Start button = Before the game has started, you can set the alarm.
press the start button again to turn your alarm off.

R shoulder button = Restarts the game.
